text: HackerRank | Prepare Certify Compete Apply Search   1  All Contests SRBD Code Contest - 2024 (Round 1) Mathematician Montu  Mathematician Montu locked Problem Submissions Discussions Time Limit: ++ Memory Limit: Montu is a student of a great mathematician. The mathematician has a subtask to complete his research. He has two numbers and . He wants to ﬁnd out how many integers are there such that . For example, and . There are exactly numbers upto where: . He is very much busy with his research. As Montu is his student, he assigned the task to Montu. But Montu is stuck with this task and he wants your help. Input Format The ﬁrst line contains one integer — the number of test cases. First line of each test case contains two integers and . The next line contains integers each representing the value . Constraints Sum of over all testcases does not exceed . Output Format For each testcase print space separated integers representing the answer for each query.
